tasks.label: build and run active cpp file
args: if /i "${fileExtname}"==".cpp" ( g++ -std=c++17 -o ${fileDirname}\${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe ${file} && ${fileDirname}\${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe < ${fileDirname}\input.txt > ${fileDirname}\output.txt ) else ( echo Please activate a .cpp file in VS Code before building. )
